description: This file defines utility functions for splitting a string into tokens and storing them in a custom linked list data structure. It includes a singleton object 'SplitUtils' with methods to split a string, validate tokens, and add tokens to a linked list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string splitting utilities

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string by spaces and returns a linked list of tokens

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is non-empty
